title: [caffe2] How to freeze a layer?
body_html:
Hi, I'm working on caffe2.
I want to know how to freeze a certain layer, which means I don`t want to update a parameter (weight, bias) of a certain conv layer. How can I implement this feature? I found Stopgradient, Negategradient, Zerogradient in caffe2 doc, however none of them seems useful for me.
